metadata.Title: CVE-2022-29023 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the razermouse driver of OpenRazer up to version v3.3.0 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) and possibly escalate their privileges via a crafted buffer sent to the matrix_custom_frame device.

criterions.comment: openrazer package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
